name: Class AWTEventMulticaster
codes:
public class AWTEventMulticaster
extends Object
implements ComponentListener, ContainerListener, FocusListener, KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, WindowListener, WindowFocusListener, WindowStateListener, ActionListener, ItemListener, AdjustmentListener, TextListener, InputMethodListener, HierarchyListener, HierarchyBoundsListener, MouseWheelListener

fields.description: A variable in the event chain (listener-a)
A variable in the event chain (listener-b)

methods.method_sig: protected EventListener remove (EventListener oldl)
methods.description:
Removes a listener from this multicaster.
 
 The returned multicaster contains all the listeners in this
 multicaster with the exception of all occurrences of oldl.
 If the resulting multicaster contains only one regular listener
 the regular listener may be returned.  If the resulting multicaster
 is empty, then null may be returned instead.
 
 No exception is thrown if oldl is null.

methods.method_sig: public void componentResized (ComponentEvent e)
methods.description:
Handles the componentResized event by invoking the
 componentResized methods on listener-a and listener-b.

methods.method_sig:
protected static EventListener addInternal (EventListener a,
                                           EventListener b)
methods.description:
Returns the resulting multicast listener from adding listener-a
 and listener-b together.
 If listener-a is null, it returns listener-b;
 If listener-b is null, it returns listener-a
 If neither are null, then it creates and returns
 a new AWTEventMulticaster instance which chains a with b.

methods.method_sig:
protected static EventListener removeInternal (EventListener l,
                                              EventListener oldl)
methods.description:
Returns the resulting multicast listener after removing the
 old listener from listener-l.
 If listener-l equals the old listener OR listener-l is null,
 returns null.
 Else if listener-l is an instance of AWTEventMulticaster,
 then it removes the old listener from it.
 Else, returns listener l.

methods.method_sig:
protected void saveInternal (ObjectOutputStream s,
                            String k)
                     throws IOException
methods.description:
Serialization support. Saves all Serializable listeners
 to a serialization stream.

methods.method_sig:
protected static void save (ObjectOutputStream s,
                           String k,
                           EventListener l)
                    throws IOException
methods.description: Saves a Serializable listener chain to a serialization stream.

methods.method_sig:
public static <T extends EventListener> T[] getListeners (EventListener l,
                                                         Class<T> listenerType)
methods.description:
Returns an array of all the objects chained as
 FooListeners by the specified
 java.util.EventListener.
 FooListeners are chained by the
 AWTEventMulticaster using the
 addFooListener method.
 If a null listener is specified, this method returns an
 empty array. If the specified listener is not an instance of
 AWTEventMulticaster, this method returns an array which
 contains only the specified listener. If no such listeners are chained,
 this method returns an empty array.
